benchmark_details.name: NepaliGPT Benchmark Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The first NepaliGPT benchmark dataset comprised of 4296 question-answer pairs in the Nepali language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a generative large language model tailored specifically for the Nepali language.

data.source: Collection from multiple public Nepali sites and translation of existing English sources into Nepali.
data.annotation: Manual verification and filtering for quality.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics were calculated using the Nepali language generated outputs and benchmarked against existing metrics.
methodology.interpretation: Causal coherence evaluates if the model output makes logical sense; causal consistency evaluates the uniformity of coherence across outputs.
methodology.validation: The model was validated using unseen test datasets containing 50 data points.
